title: Cynthia Larive - Wikipedia
snippet: Cynthia Larive is an American scientist and academic administrator serving as the chancellor of University of California, Santa Cruz. Larive's research focuses on nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy (NMR) and mass spectrometry. She was previously a professor of chemistry and provost and ...

title: r/UCSC on Reddit: the chancellor is receiving a 28.5% pay increase.
snippet: Article states "UC Santa Cruz Chancellor Cynthia Larive will voluntarily forgo her base salary increase for 2024-25." You should know that this is in reference to the 4% across-the-board increase that all staff got, not the upcoming 28.5% increase.

title: University of California, Santa Cruz (UCSC) Highest Paid Employees
snippet: In 2022 the University of California, Santa Cruz (UCSC) reported 1,250 employees making more than $100,000 per year; the average salary was $69,217. The highest reported pay was $526,900 for Cynthia Larive, Chan. The University of California, Santa Cruz (UCSC) in 2022 ranked 246th in the nation ...

title: Contact Administrators and Public Officials – pay us more ucsc
